steps.title: A passenger princess is someone who has other people drive them around.
steps.content: A passenger princess is someone who has other people drive them around. The term usually refers to a woman who sits in the passenger seat while their significant other acts as a chauffeur for them. [1] X Research source A passenger princess may be someone who doesn’t have their driver’s license, or they may just dislike driving. “When someone refers to themselves as a passenger princess, they’re tapping into their feminine energy and communicating that they typically don’t like to drive themselves," says influencer and content creator Jessica Lizarraga. This could be because they prefer "princess treatment,” or because they’re embracing “I’m just a girl!” energy, Lizarraga says.

steps.title: Though the term usually refers to women, it can be used for any gender.
steps.content: Though the term usually refers to women, it can be used for any gender. Many people have also jokingly used the term to describe their dogs or pets who sit in the passenger seat while they drive. Here are a few examples of ways to use the term “passenger princess”: [2] X Research source “When we went on our road trip, my boyfriend drove the whole way while I ate snacks and napped. I was a total passenger princess.” “Driving stresses me out, so all my friends know I’m a passenger princess. I’ll handle the music and the GPS, but I’m not getting behind the steering wheel!” “I take my duties as passenger princess very seriously. I make sure we have a ton of snacks and the perfect playlist to set the vibe.” “I took my dog to the vet, and he was a total passenger princess. He was sticking his head out the window and having a great time while I dealt with traffic.”

steps.title: The term “passenger princess” started going viral on TikTok in 2023.
steps.content: The term “passenger princess” started going viral on TikTok in 2023. Users started posting videos of themselves acting as passenger princesses, referring to the passenger seat as their “throne.” [3] X Research source They also posted videos of their “duties” as passenger princess, which included things like curating music playlists, bringing snacks and beverages, and managing the GPS directions. [4] X Research source According to Lizarraga, TikTok users began “embracing their role as passenger princess by posting aesthetic videos of themselves in the passenger side of a car.” This means “wearing comfy shoes, having perfect makeup, and having plenty of snacks and beverages,” while also showing gratitude for the person driving, Lizarraga explains.

steps.title: Curate the perfect playlist for the drive.
steps.content: Curate the perfect playlist for the drive. As passenger princess, it’s your duty to create good vibes in the car ride through your song choices. [5] X Research source Help the driver stay awake on a long road trip with fun, upbeat songs to sing along to. Or, create a themed playlist based on your destination to go the extra mile! For example, if you’re headed to a concert, create a playlist of the artist’s best songs to get pumped for their performance. Or, if you’re on your way to the beach, choose some fun, summery songs to set the mood.

steps.title: Pay attention to the GPS.
steps.content: Pay attention to the GPS. If you’re using a GPS for directions to your destination, watch it closely and tell the driver when turns or freeway exits are coming up. This helps make sure you don't get lost, and it prevents any mishaps that might add time to your trip!

steps.title: Stock up on snacks and beverages.
steps.content: Stock up on snacks and beverages. Another key passenger princess duty is keeping everyone hydrated and satiated with snacks on long drives. [6] X Research source Bring some of the driver’s favorite candy or salty snacks to show them a little extra love and thank them for driving!

steps.title: Hold onto important cargo.
steps.content: Hold onto important cargo. If you’re picking up a bunch of takeout food and beverages, it’s your duty as passenger princess to hold on to them tightly and make sure they don’t spill. This goes for any fragile items you're transporting, like a big birthday cake or a delicate bouquet of flowers.

steps.title: Thank the driver.
steps.content: Thank the driver. Whether the person driving is a friend, significant other, or family member, show them you appreciate them. Thank them with a sweet handwritten note, or a thoughtful gift. A passenger princess would be nothing without a chauffeur to take them around town, after all!
